Title: To the Skies!
Description:
We have a plan to halt the mogu's weaponmaking capabilities, and it involves the creature you recovered from the Zandalari.

Speak to me when you're ready to learn more.
ObjectivesText: Gain access to the Lightning Vein Mine.
RewardText: Incredible work. This presents us with a monumental opportunity.

Objectives.Text: Speak to Jaina Proudmoore to begin your mission
